Source code for src.controllers.login_log

"""File to handle longin_log controller"""
from ..models import Models, create, delete, update

login_log = Models.LoginLog



[docs]def get_all_login_logs() -> login_log.Model:
    """
    Get all login_logs
    Returns:
        login_log.Model: login_log.Model
    """
    return login_log.Model.query.all()




[docs]def get_login_log_by_id(_id: int) -> login_log.Model:
    """
    Get login_log by id
    Args:
        _id (int): id of login_log
    Returns:
        login_log.Model: login_log.Model
    """
    return login_log.Model.query.get(_id)




[docs]def get_login_log_by_user_name(user_name: str) -> login_log.Model:
    """
    Get login_log by username
    Args:
        username (str): username of login_log
    Returns:
        login_log.Model: login_log.Model
    """
    return login_log.Model.query.filter_by(user_name=user_name).all()




[docs]async def post_login_log(data: dict) -> login_log.Model or None:
    """
    Post login_log
    Args:
        data (dict): data to work with
    Returns:
        login_log.Model: login_log.Model
    """
    response, new_login_log = await create(data, "LoginLog")
    if response:
        return new_login_log
    return None




[docs]async def update_login_log(_id: int, data: dict) -> login_log.Model or None:
    """
    Update login_log
    Args:
        _id (int): id of login_log
        data (dict): data to work with
    Returns:
        login_log.Model: login_log.Model
    """
    login_log_to_update = get_login_log_by_id(_id)
    if login_log_to_update:
        for key, value in data.items():
            setattr(login_log_to_update, key, value)
        response, login_log_to_update = await update(login_log_to_update, "LoginLog")
        if response:
            return login_log_to_update
    return None




[docs]async def delete_login_log(_id: int) -> bool:
    """
    Delete login_log
    Args:
        _id (int): id of login_log
    Returns:
        bool: True if deleted, False if not
    """
    login_log_to_delete = get_login_log_by_id(_id)
    if login_log_to_delete:
        return await delete(login_log_to_delete, "LoginLog")
    return False
